name: One night at rousers
description:
It’s a simple night at home filling out your job application. You have recently been hired to monitor as security gaurd of Rouser’s camp site, which has recently been saved from abolishment by developers putting in upscale condos to include shopping and office space, including units with access to the fitness center, dance floor, movie studio, and more. Your only issue:The animatronics get active at night looking for people. You must survive at all costs.

Your device is incomplete. Go to Purplecade+ now and play at no additional cost
